item.title: [Python] Use LibreOffice app with Python (2) Operate calc (from macro and external)
item.description: ## First, try operating calc. The operation is simple, just put a number in the cell of A1. I am trying with windows. As a preparation, first, launch a new calc. macro Put the following python script in your macro. def a1(): doc = XSCRIPTCONTEXT.getDocument() sheet = doc.getSheets().getByName('Sheet1') A1 = sheet.getCellRangeByName('A1') A1.Value = 100 Run Tools -> Macros -> Manage Macros -> python -> Scripts -> a1. On A1, Holds 100.
